data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Knapp, Sandra (2010): New species of Solanum (Solanaceae) from Peru and Ecuador. PhytoKeys 1: 33-52, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.1.659, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.1.659
